verses.roman:
gopī-gaṇa kare yabe kṛṣṇa-daraśana
sukha-vāñchā nāhi, sukha haya koṭi-guṇa

synonyms: gopī-gaṇa—the gopīs; kare—do; yabe—when; kṛṣṇa-daraśana—seeing Lord Kṛṣṇa; sukha-vāñchā—desire for happiness; nāhi—there is not; sukha—the happiness; haya—there is; koṭi-guṇa—ten million times.
translation: When the gopīs see Lord Kṛṣṇa, they derive unbounded bliss, although they have no desire for such pleasure.
